comments.body: Can you create unit tests for internal->external and vice-versa? In other words, covering the logic in `gce_loadbalancer.go`

I don't recall; do we have helper functions that assert all GCP resources for internal or external LBs? If so, they would be nice to use for sanity checking the conversion. Would also be nice if we sanity checked that the old resources were deleted.
Discussed offline, and concluded that internal -> external, external-> internal lb tests should go in a new PR.
